CustomField.description: This is a projected indication of the employment total. It identifies if employment will increase or decrease over the next 12 months.The value corresponds to most recent Interaction
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is a projected indication of the employment total. It identifies if employment will increase or decrease over the next 12 months.The value corresponds to most recent Interaction
CustomField.label: Empl. Incr. or Decr. Next 12 Months
